item.title: Flash Cisco IOS on a C3750G Switch
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Flash Cisco IOS firmware on C3750G switch.
item.content:encoded:
Environment

  • Switch Model: WS-C3750G-24PS-S
  • Old firmware: c3750-advipservicesk9-mz.122-44.SE4.bin
  • New firmware: c3750-ipservicesk9-mz.150-2.SE11.bin

Steps

  1. Set up a TFTP server with SolarWinds TFTP Server. We assume the server IP is 192.168.0.100 .
  2. On the switch, perform the following steps:
# Verify current IOS version, view current IOS bin file.
show version
show switch
dir flash:
# Assuming that your switch only have one flash.

# Delete old IOS firmware file.
delete /f /r flash:c3750-advipservicesk9-mz.122-44.SE4.bin

# Copy new IOS firmware from TFTP server.
copy tftp flash
# Follow the prompts and provide server IP and file name.

# Configure and verify boot file.
show boot

config t
boot system switch all flash:/c3750-ipservicesk9-mz.150-2.SE11.bin
exit
show boot

# Apply changes and reload switch.
write memory
reload

Troubleshooting

When using the c3750-advipservicesk9-mz.122-44.SE4.bin firmware, SSH connection to the switch prompts the following message:

no matching key exchange method found. Their offer: diffie-hellman-group1-sha1

Use the following command to connect (using PowerShell or CMD):

ssh -oKexAlgorithms=+diffie-hellman-group1-sha1 -c aes256-cbc username@ip_address

item.title: Network Administration
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Common network administration tools, commands, and notes.
item.content:encoded:
In Construction

Command requires cmd with administrative privilege.

netsh wlan show wlanreport

item.title: SSH: no matching cipher found
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
When connecting to older Cisco routers and switches (e.g. Cisco 2951, Cisco C3750G), it’s likely that you’ll encounter this error when initiating an SSH connection: SSH: no matching cipher found and the device will display a list of offered ciphers. e.g. Their offer: aes128-cbc,3des-cbc,aes192-cbc,aes256-cbc

To connect, run the SSH command with the -c flag plus one of the offered ciphers:

ssh -c aes256-cbc USERNAME@IP

item.title: 多台vista机器组建小型局域网
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: 多台Vista机器组件小型局域网
item.content:encoded:
此文系早年博客的备份，仅用于参考学习。
This article is an archival copy of my early years’ blog posts.

Tag: 多台vista机器组建局域网 vista笔记本组建无线局域网 vista系统组建无线局域网 vista局域网文件共享 vista“网络发现”无法启动 在“网络”里能看见对方机器但无法访问（windows无法访问）

1 – 在vista “网络和共享中心”中启用 “网络发现”和“文件共享”。若发现“网络发现”无法设置为“启用”，或无论怎样开启“网络发现”，都只显示“自定义”时，参考以下设置：

右键计算机 →管理→服务和应用程序→服务，将下述服务设置为启动：

Computer Browser
DHCP Client
DNS Client
Function Discovery Resource Publication
Remote Procedure Call（RPC）
Remote Procedure Call（RPC）Locator
Server
SSDP Discovery
TCP/IP NetBIOS Helper
UPnP Device Host

设置完后 “网络发现”就可以设置为“启动”了。

2 – 将多台机器均进行上述操作后，在“网络”里应该已经能看见彼此的计算机名，但这时可能还无法访问对方共享的资源。继续进行如下设置：

  • 运行→gpedit.msc→计算机配置→Windows设置→安全设置→本地策略→用户权限分配：
  • 确保“从网络访问此计算机”内包含“everyone”
  • “拒绝从网络访问这台计算机”中将“Guest”删除
  • 再进入“本地策略→安全选项”, 将“帐户：来宾帐户状态”设置为“已启用”

3 – 确保“Windows防火墙”的设置中，在“例外”中已经勾选“网络发现”和“文件和打印机共享”，并且其他的防火墙工具都没有对相关的操作进行限制。

进行过上述操作，同一工作组内的计算机应该可以彼此互相访问了。

4 – 补充：文件夹及驱动器的共享设置

在共享文件夹时，要在下面的菜单内添加授权访问的用户，一般添加“everyone”，并设置其为“读者”，其具有只读权限。

若想共享整个驱动器，设置方法和共享文件夹略有不同，打开驱动器（如D盘）属性→在“安全”→“组或用户名”中添加“Guest”用户，设置其权限；然后切换至“共享”选项卡→高级共享→选中“共享此文件夹”后确定，即可完成驱动器的共享。
